segmentosSRT.text: Or I introduce him. Gustavo Rojas.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Gustavo Rojas, he is chief of the Kawiyarí tribe...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Well, there's many different ones. Like Tucanos, and some others...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Let's stop for a minute. One question. She will ask so you can answer that...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Are you having fun?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: More, more, more!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: - Are you all right? - Yes!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
Come then, so you can
get some water on you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ how I would adore you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ You looked at me, and I stared at you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
♪ Until one day, we finally
understood each other.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
♪ Who could imagine that then
our children would come
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
♪ To bring joy to this
place for all eternity.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: It’s August 9, 1996.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Tomorrow is the parade of Silleteros. Don Carlos Zapata is here with us
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: who’s going to parade with a monumental style silleta.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Don Carlos, for how long have you been participating in the parade?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: And how many times have you won?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: I've only lost twice in ten years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
Because I stopped competing. I've been
the winner for eight years now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: - You stopped competing? - Yes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: - We wish you good luck for tomorrow. - Thank you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Federico.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Federico...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Federico...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Federico.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: MUTE FIRE
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03
